title: Ultimate Whoosh SFX
description: A collection of whooshes perfect for your project’s transitions, magic spells, vehicle passbys and flybys, character power-ups, weapons, and more.
longDescription:
FREE SAMPLES of this pack here

AUDIO TRAILER


If you’re looking for a pack filled with classic whooshes…THIS IS NOT IT! Oh yes, there are some classic whooshes in here, but also so much more.


Ultimate Whoosh is a combination of 6 mini packs. Get a complete collection of whooshes perfect for your project’s transitions, magic spells, vehicle passbys and flybys, character power-ups, weapons, and more.


In the sound pack, you will find whooshes and flybys including Abstract Whooshes, Elemental Whooshes, Flybys, Stingers, Textured Whooshes, Metal, Organic, Sci-fi, and many more.


All sounds in the Ultimate Whoosh sound pack are drag-and-drop ready for your project. Every audio file is UCS compatible and can be easily searched and found as they are meticulously organized with metadata chunks including description and keywords among others.

 

Discover

·        1000+ whooshes that you can import directly into your project

·        Air, organic, metal, magic, sci-fi, crunchy, crackly, whiz by, flyby, sub-heavy, reversers, granular, cinematic, electric, fire, water, friction, and more

·        Over 4GB of HQ audio content (at 96khz 24bit)

·        Super HQ audio recorded and designed at 192k 32bit and delivered at 96k 24bit (Note: Note all files have full frequency range)

·        Easily and quickly find sounds with richly embedded metadata (Soundminer, Basehead, Soundly, UCS, BWF)

 

Included in this pack: 

Abstract Whooshes Pack (213 files)

Elemental Whooshes Pack (167 files)

Only Flybys Pack (129 files)

Short Whooshes Pack (115 files)

Stinger Whooshes Pack (28 files) (BONUS)

Textured Whooshes Pack (297 files)

Whoosh Variation Pack (all sausage files) (119 files of 8+ variations each)


Find the complete asset list HERE
technicalDetails:
Total Audio Files: 1068

Total SFX: 2020

Total Minutes of Audio: 2hr 05min 18sec (125 minutes)

Sample Rate & Bit Depth: 96kHz & 24bit

File Type: WAV

Format: Stereo

Metadata: Soundminer, Basehead, Soundly, UCS, BWF

Do Sound FX Loop?: no
